body.name: Bifevsr 4K Digital Camera with SD Card, 48MP Vlogging Camera with Viewfinder Flash Dial, Camera for Photography and Video Autofocus, Portable Travel Camera, 16X Zoom Anti-Shake Small Digital Camera
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 2 hrs 28 mins
features: 📷CAMERA WITH VIEWFINDER AND DIAL: 48MP 4K digital camera takes stunning photos and videos, and CMOS True Color technology captures detailed and realistic textures. This vlogging camera with viewfinder can reduce the impact of bright light when shooting in summer, helping beginners achieve professional composition! The small point-and-shoot camera with a rotating dial allows teens, beginners, and the elderly to quickly get started.

📸AUTOFOCUS & ANTI-SHAKE FOR UHD: The 48MP digital camera for photography and video adds autofocus (press the shutter lightly), and the 1'' close-up and long-distance can shoot HD texture blockbusters! 4K video camera for beginners(30FPS) has pause and play functions, meeting your HD needs for shooting sports, and time-lapse, timing, and slow motion, saving video production time!

📸FLASH & PORTABLE TRAVEL: Bifevsr digital camera with flash allows you to clearly record cultural landscapes even in the dark. The vlogging travel camera has an ultra-compact design, easily putting the compact portable camera in your pocket. 0.32 LBS fits the size of a teen's palm, and upgraded lightweight materials ensure that the hands won't feel tired when shooting for a long time!

🎁WARM GIFT AND MULTIFUNCTION: 4K digital camera has more plays: date stamp, 16x zoom, time-lapse (2/5/10S), continuous shooting, slow motion, beauty, face/smile capture...YouTube camera as a webcam that allows you to easily use it on Facebook, Twitter, etc. And the small camera is an ideal gift for lovers, friends, children or parents on Valentine's Day, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas or birthday, conveying love in home life, and social software!

📨TRANSFER & SERVICE: The digital camera with various accessories can be connected to a 1/4 screw tripod and a microphone（by the hot shoe）. Use the HDMI cable to transmit to the TV for viewing, and connect to the computer by the Type-C cable to upload quickly! In addition, we provide a 1-year hassle-free camera, 32G micro SD card, and 2 rechargeable batteries..., if you have any questions, feel free to contact our service staff to quickly reply!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Newest 4K Digital Camera What's the advantage of this upgraded digital camera? Added Rotary Dial: 8 commonly used modes can be switched with one click, making it easy for beginners to get started.Adding A Viewfinder: Avoiding the impact of strong light in outdoor travel photography in winter and summer, while imaging focus allows for better composition photography.Lighter Upgraded Material: Reduces size and weight without affecting performance, making it easier to carry when traveling.Flash Settings: 3 flash modes, adjust the flash according to the surrounding environment.

Digital Camera for Video and Photography Vlogging Camera with Autofocus Autofocus Camera: Half-press the shutter to autofocus, press the shutter immediately after the yellow frame on the screen turns green to take photos. Increases the sense of clarity, and you can shoot clearly at both distances and near distances.

More Functions for Bifevsr Camera Digital Camera for Photography and Video Viewfinder: Eyes are not affected by strong light, more detailed composition.Flash: You can take clear photos of street scenes, night parties, etc. even in dark nights.Anti-shake: More stable for shooting photos during sports.Digital Zoom: Continuous zoom from 2x, 4X, 8X to a maximum of 16X.

Small Point and Shoot Digital Camera Digital Camera with Dial and Filters This point-and-shoot camera is not only suitable for adult beginners, but also suitable for teenagers and seniors. The simple button design contains multiple functions at a glance! The choice of more than a dozen filters increases the tolerance to various environments and chooses the atmosphere you want!

Vlogging Camera for Output/Input Digital Camera for TV Computer Phone Charge Transfer Computer: Compatible with Windows systems, use a Type-C cable to ensure that you can view files on the computer after clicking "MDSC" when the camera is turned on.

Warm Gift for Festival Or Daily Bifevsr Digital Camera What holiday is a digital camera suitable for gifting? Valentine's Day, Mother's Day, Father's Day, Children's Day, Graduation Season, Halloween, Christmas, Anniversaries, and more to commemorate beautiful moments! What accessories are included with the camera? Dust-proof lens and lens cap, camera bag and cleaning cloth, long strap for hanging around the neck or hand, 2 batteries, a 32G SD card, an instruction manual and a brief operation guide, which can be transferred to a computer or charged Type-c charging cable and HDMI cable for TV transmission. Note: If you have any questions, click on the store quickly, and the staff member will answer faster!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best for price!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I got it delivered today and you know what? The product is amazing. It’s looks so cool when you carry in your hand. Also the quality of the pictures are worth the price . Provided with aVery detailed instruction manual , Memory card, two batteries . I definitely recommend this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This is a great digital camera, it came with a great package, carrying bag, cables, strip, and even better, it has 2 batteries which is very useful. The camera is very easy to use with clear instruction, good product for this price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bifevsr 4K Digital Camera
reviews.reviewText: I bought the Bifevsr 4K Digital Camera for a specific event. The instruction manual is easy to follow. I am extremely pleased with the quality of the camera. The high definition of the photos is flawless. The video feature is excellent and easy to use. You get a 1-year warranty and a lifetime service with a 24-hour hot line. I could not be happier with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 4k Camera Great Deal!
reviews.reviewText: Great camera, very affordable for what it provides. It has a screen that you can flip so you can see what you are doing - great for blogging or taking selfies! It gives you everything necessary - an hdmi to micro and/or mini hdmi, gives you 32gb memory and 2 camera batteries. Great deal and great for beginners! Try it out!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I'm looking for a camera that's not only compact and easy to carry, but also boasts a sleek, black design for a more subtle and professional look. It's important that it allows for quick and effortless photography, perfect for capturing moments on the go. I'm particularly drawn to its unique design and am highly impressed with the vivid and true-to-life colors it produces in photos. Overall, I'm very pleased with its performance and aesthetic

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty nice, easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I recently got this camera, and it's a gem! Not the fanciest out there, but perfect for kids and seniors. Simple to use, with 4K resolution – great as a gift. The clarity of the pictures is impressive, and it even records audio. Overall it’s a great camera and recommend for capturing moments with loved ones

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This camera was extremely easy to figure out with very clear instructions. Picture and media quality was better than I expected. Would definitely buy again or give as a gift!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Easy to use Digital Camera
reviews.reviewText: This digital camera is very straight forward and easy to use. The quality of the videos and photos is very good. The is a steal for the price of this digital camera.
It's good for the value and also has 32G micro sd card included. Very easy to carry, all the photos were clear and all of the camera settings were easy to change. taking nice picture also lightweight

I recently purchased this product and I must say, I am very pleased with my purchase. This camera offers exceptional value for its price, with a range of features that make it a great choice for those looking for a budget-friendly option. While the picture quality may not be the best, the camera itself is well-made, easy to use, and comes with some impressive features, including 16X zoom and autofocus anti-shake. I found the camera to be a joy to use, and the fact that it is portable and comes with two batteries made it even more convenient. Overall, I think this camera is a fantastic choice for anyone looking for a fun and functional camera that won't break the bank. For its price point and overall value, I give this product a solid 5-star review

I recently purchased this camera, and I must say, I'm impressed with its performance! The image quality is outstanding, with sharp details and vibrant colors that truly capture the essence of each scene. The camera's compact design and user-friendly interface make it easy to carry and navigate, even for a beginner like myself.The battery life has been more than satisfactory, allowing me to shoot for extended periods without needing to recharge. Additionally, the camera's built-in Wi-Fi connectivity makes transferring images to my devices a breeze. Overall, I highly recommend this camera to anyone in search of a reliable, high-quality photography companion. Five stars!

The standout feature of this digital camera is its sleek appearance and the addition of a viewfinder, which enhances the shooting experience. The flash & auto-focus functions are also impressive and fully meet my requirements for capturing clear and vibrant landscapes and portraits in both day and night settings.One minor drawback is that the camera's battery can be inserted backwards, resulting in charging failure. Nevertheless, the adjustment process is straightforward. The camera comes equipped with a 32G micro SD card, neck strap, and camera bag, while its flexible and compact body allows for extended shooting sessions without discomfort. What truly sets this 4K camera apart, however, is the range of special features and settings it offers for both video and picture-taking. From fully automatic functions to night, portrait, landscape, backlight, sports, party, and beach modes, there are endless possibilities to choose from.Overall, I am thoroughly impressed with the well-designed and sturdy build of this camera. It comes with a host of thoughtful accessories, including two batteries and a separate charger, a lens cap, a USB charging cable, an HDMI cable, and a cleaning cloth. I will continue to explore this camera and update with any additional insights I may have.

I bought this camera for my 10 years old niece for her to learn how to use a camera.She really loves it! It has a nice package that is good for a gift. It comes with a memory card so I don't have to buy it separately and also has a camera bag that is easy to carry out.It's easy to use and with good quality, really worth the price !And it only takes 1.5 days to post to my home which is so quick.
